# milesPerImperialGallon

**Type Property**

The miles per imperial gallon unit of fuel efficiency.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying class var milesPerImperialGallon: UnitFuelEfficiency { get }
```

## Accessing Predefined Units

- **litersPer100Kilometers**: The liters per 100 kilometers unit of fuel efficiency.
- **milesPerGallon**: The miles per gallon unit of fuel efficiency.
